long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to channel your motivation for sending climbs towards completing tasks on your to do list? Then you will love this app.

This to do list allows you to create tasks and assign each task a grade using the bouldering V-Scale or Font-Scale. This grade can be used to represent difficulty of the task, urgency to complete it, or anything else that comes to mind! It is open to your interpretation, have fun with it!
Once the item is completed, it can be crossed off by clicking it or deleted by pressing the X.
